title: Panic in the streets [NTSC]
creator_contributor_role: Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Academy awards (Motion pictures)
description: This noir suspense was filmed entirely on location in New Orleans, and shot in an improvised semi-documentary style using many local non-actors. Richard Widmark plays a city medical officer, racing against time to stop a plague epidemic of huge proportions. The initial carrier was an illegal alien, who has been murdered by criminals who have themselves contracted the disease. Widmark defies official resistance and immerses himself in the seedy underworld of the New Orleans wharf district, in order to hunt down the killers who are characterised literally as an unhealthy 'menace to society'. Cast also includes Jack Palance, Paul Douglas, Barbara Bel Geddes and Zero Mostel. Music by Alfred Newman. The film won an Academy Award for best motion picture story.
